entry.title: 219: "Leave Me the F*** Alone!" w. Princess Rivulet
entry.content:
For today's conversation, I am joined by the amazing Princess Rivulet to discuss everything from racial issues to abortion, the liberty movement, censorship, and how to simply say "Leave me the f*** alone!".

All that and oh so much more, on today's episode of The System is Down #218: "Leave Me the F*** Alone!" w. Princess Rivulet

http://thetakeoneverything.com

In the bonus, Riv and I chat more about cancel culture and how to "be your own government". That and all the weekly bonus episodes, can be found at patreon.com/thesystemisdown.

entry.title: 217: How to Censor-Proof Your Podcast, Brand, and Voice w. Chris Spangle
entry.content:
Today, I'm chatting with the great, Chris Spangle on how he has managed to navigate the censorship world with his (often "controversial") podcast network, We Are Libertarians, for nearly a decade. This is not just a message for podcasters tho. This is a call to everyone, to actively seek independence and stop letting your voice be reliant on the approval of big tech empires that hate you.

All that and more, on today's episode of The System is Down # 217: How to Censor-Proof Your Podcast, Brand, and Voice w. Chris Spangle

http://chrisspangle.com 
http://wearelibertarians.com 
http://leadersandlegends.net 

In the bonus episode, Chris makes the strongest case I've heard, for why Trump's impeachment is valid. You already know my stance, but civil discourse is what we're all about here. If you want the FULL conversation, be sure to join The Downers Club at patreon.com/thesystemisdown!

Call in and leave a vm.

entry.title: 215: Trump's Acquittal, Gina's Tweets, and Cuomo's Genocide
entry.content:
On today’s episode, I’m digging into as many current events as I can squeeze into an hour and them I’m talking about them for much longer than I intend to… as always. Time to watch it burn and share a good laugh.

On the docket:

*Gina Corano cancelled for anti-antisemitic tweets

*Despite fake evidence, Trump’s impeachment failed, no surprise. What’s next?!

*Bill Gates makes AI zombie reanimation a new reality

*Greta Thuneberg & David Hogg are still relevant, somehow.

*Did Gov Cuomo commit elderly genocide and win an Emmy for it?

*8 year old UK bathroom raver DJ

*and much more

Sorry for the audio. We’re workin on it. ;)

entry.title: 214: Impeachment Circus: The Greatest Show Unearthed!
entry.content:
If at first you don't succeed, kick and scream and try again.

I wasn't planning on doing this episode today, but with the whole impeachment circus going on right now, I had a lot on my mind. If you're here to make assumptions on my stance without listening to it, leave. 

There's more nuance in the world than the powers that be, would like you to believe. Open your mind, hear me out, and if you disagree, just civilly let me know and we can talk. That's all I ask. I don't have a pony in this circus, but that's not going to prevent me from pointing out flagrant corruption and hypocrisy. Why? Because the system is down.

All that and more on today's episode #214: Impeachment Circus: The Greatest Show Unearthed!

Call in and leave a vm.

entry.title: 213: How to Never Wear a Mask Again w. Allan Stevo
entry.content:
Today's episode is my conversation with Mises Institute bestselling author, Allan Stevo.

In his latest book, Face Masks in One Lesson, Allan lays out all the evidence on the ineffectiveness of face masks in this pandemic, the actual HARM that they are causing, and all the ways that you can protect yourself from this science denying, mental virus of face mask compliance. 

Open your mind, take off your masks, and buckle up. It's time for some scary facts. 
All that and much more, on today's episode of The System is Down episode 213: How to Never Wear a Mask Again w. Allan Stevo.

We also did a full bonus episode that, I think went even longer than this one. To hear me pick the brain of a bitcoin blockchain brilliant mind on all things crypto and GameStop stock surges, come join The Downers Club for this and bonus episodes every single week at https://patreon.com/thesystemisdown

Allan Stevo: https://realstevo.com

entry.content:
We did it! I got tired of getting kicked off of Youtube and Facebook, so I created OUR social network, which is now live at AntiNewsLive.com. If you're tired of that Stockholm Syndrome feeling you get, every time you log into Fact Check Landia, come join real people having real conversations on OUR new social network home, AntiNewsLive.com.

Also, I'll be ranting on why we got yet another Youtube strike. Trust me, I'm more tired of it happening than you are tired of hearing me rant about it.

Also also, while calling for "unity", AOC accuses Ted Cruz of attempted murder.
